import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './Hero.css'; import SignupModal from './SignupModal'; const Hero = () => { const [showSignupModal, setShowSignupModal] = useState(false); const handleGetStarted = () => { setShowSignupModal(true); }; const handleCloseModal = () => { setShowSignupModal(false); }; return (

Discover Amazing Events Near You

Connect with your community through memorable experiences. Find, register, and attend events that matter to you.

{showSignupModal && }
50K+ Events
2M+ Attendees
100+ Cities
Scroll to explore
); }; export default Hero;
